events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because it doesn't fit me and I would like a refund.
Customer's message indicates a refund request due to a return for an ill-fitting product.
The case has been assigned to support agent Sarah M. for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket return. I'm Sarah and I'd be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and yes, the jacket is still unused and in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days for a full refund. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for your help and the quick response!
The return label email has been sent. Once we receive the returned item, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have shipped the jacket back and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I dropped off the package yesterday at the post office. Thanks again for your help!
We received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. Please allow 3-5 business days to see the amount back on your payment method.
Your case regarding the jacket return and refund is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us and feel free to reach out anytime.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback is valuable to us.
